text: Boeing 737-600 at Kiruna Airport Kiruna Airport is the northernmost airport in Sweden. It lies around ten kilometres from the town centre of Kiruna. In 2018, the airport served 277,018 passengers. ==Future== Kiruna Airport is the chosen destination for the Spaceport Sweden project. Spaceport Sweden is a new venture between Swedish Space Corporation, the Jukkasjärvi Icehotel, LFV Group and Progressum, in which they hope, when operations start that Virgin Galactic will make their second base after the USA.Spaceport Sweden ==Airlines and destinations== ===Helicopter routes=== There are scheduled helicopter flights for paying passengers in the mountain region of Kiruna. One such is Nikkaluokta-Kebnekaise mountain lodge, which goes twice daily in the summer season operated by Kallax Flyg.Linjetrafik Nikkaluokta – Kebnekaise ==Statistics== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%" width= align= |+ Busiest routes to and from Kiruna Airport (2019) |- style="background:lightgrey;" ! All five personnel on board died. ==Ground transportation== *Bus 91 to Kiruna busstation and Narvik is available a few months a year. *Airport Bus is available year- round.https://www.swedavia.com/kiruna/to-from/bus/ *Taxi and airport taxi are available. *Rental cars are available. ==References== ==External links== * *Spaceport Sweden Category:Airports in Sweden Category:Airports in the Arctic Airport Category:Buildings and structures in Norrbotten County
